themes.name: Retro & Nostalgic
themes.description: Y2K aesthetics, 90s vibes, vintage computing, neon gradients, pixel art accents
themes.approach: Y2K-inspired design with bold gradients, playful typography, and nostalgic UI elements reminiscent of early web design

themes.name: Brutalist
themes.description: Raw, bold, unapologetic design with strong typography and minimal decoration
themes.approach: Brutalist design philosophy with raw HTML aesthetics, bold typography, stark contrasts, and intentionally rough edges

themes.name: Organic & Natural
themes.description: Earth tones, flowing shapes, nature-inspired elements, soft textures
themes.approach: Organic design with flowing shapes, earth tones, natural textures, and gentle curves inspired by nature

themes.name: Maximalist Illustration
themes.description: Rich illustrations, vibrant colors, detailed graphics, playful and energetic
themes.approach: Maximalist design with rich illustrations, vibrant color palettes, detailed graphics, and energetic visual elements

themes.name: Futuristic Tech
themes.description: Sleek interfaces, neon accents, dark themes, sci-fi inspired elements
themes.approach: Futuristic tech aesthetic with sleek dark interfaces, neon accents, glowing effects, and sci-fi inspired elements

themes.name: Storytelling Interactive
themes.description: Narrative-driven design, scroll animations, immersive experiences, visual storytelling
themes.approach: Storytelling-focused design with narrative flow, scroll-triggered animations, immersive visual experiences, and interactive elements
